sentence.sentenceContent: His mother thinks it might be because Bae is a devout Christian.
And that he didn`t understand the rules of North Korea, an atheist country.
"I would like to plead with the U.
government, press and my family to stop worsening my situation by making wild rumors against North Korea and releasing materials related to me, which are not based on the facts.
government, press and my family to stop worsening my situation by making wild rumors against North Korea and releasing materials related to me, which are not based on the facts.
The president argues that much of the surveillance is just too important to scrap altogether.
After months of spirited debate sparked by the explosive revelations of Edward Snowden, the president told Americans he`ll rein in NSA surveillance, but only to a point.

The most significant changes affect the most controversial surveillance program - the bulk collection of Americans` phone records, effective immediately, the NSA will need judicial approval before searching the data.
That places a special obligation on us to ask tough questions about what we should do.
BARACK OBAMA, PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.
After months of spirited debate sparked by the explosive revelations of Edward Snowden, the president told Americans he`ll rein in NSA surveillance, but only to a point.
After months of spirited debate sparked by the explosive revelations of Edward Snowden, the president told Americans he`ll rein in NSA surveillance, but only to a point.
He`s a former NSA worker who revealed secret information about the agency, that it collects Americans` phone records and email info, among other data.
The power of new technologies means that there are fewer and fewer technical constraints on what we can do.
(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP).
(END VIDEO CLIP).
(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP).
No secret (inaudible).

The most significant changes affect the most controversial surveillance program - the bulk collection of Americans` phone records, effective immediately, the NSA will need judicial approval before searching the data.

The most significant changes affect the most controversial surveillance program - the bulk collection of Americans` phone records, effective immediately, the NSA will need judicial approval before searching the data.

The most significant changes affect the most controversial surveillance program - the bulk collection of Americans` phone records, effective immediately, the NSA will need judicial approval before searching the data.
The president asked Congress to create a panel of public advocates to counter government search requests.
And he asked the Attorney General and intelligence committee to explore moving the data out of NSA control.
But the bottom line, the program won`t necessarily end.

I heard that trust me, I`m going to put some more safeguards in place, but I`m going to keep right on collecting every American`s records.

The most significant changes affect the most controversial surveillance program - the bulk collection of Americans` phone records, effective immediately, the NSA will need judicial approval before searching the data.
The president argues that much of the surveillance is just too important to scrap altogether.

Not only because I felt that they made us more secure, but also because nothing in that initial review and nothing that I`ve learned since indicated that our intelligence community has sought to violate the law.

Not only because I felt that they made us more secure, but also because nothing in that initial review and nothing that I`ve learned since indicated that our intelligence community has sought to violate the law.
